channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP and ABAP Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP and ABAP Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-35874|2024-09-28T21:59:57.494Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP and ABAP Platform - version KRNL64NUC, 7.22, KRNL64NUC 7.22EXT, KRNL64UC 7.22, KRNL64UC 7.22EXT, KRNL64UC 7.53, KERNEL 7.22, KERNEL, 7.53, KERNEL 7.77, KERNEL 7.81, KERNEL 7.85, KERNEL 7.89, KERNEL 7.54, KERNEL 7.92, KERNEL 7.93, under some conditions, performs improper authentication checks for functionalities that require user identity. An attacker can perform malicious actions over the network, extending the scope of impact, causing a limited impact on confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-30218|2024-08-02T01:25:03.426Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: The ABAP Application Server of SAP NetWeaver as well as ABAP Platform allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service. This leads to a considerable impact on availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-30218|2024-06-04T17:39:20.427Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: The ABAP Application Server of SAP NetWeaver as well as ABAP Platform allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service. This leads to a considerable impact on availability.
